name: 李魁鵬
objective: 濕空氣線圖理論與應用、室內環境品質理論與應用、空調系統規劃、建築物勘測、負荷計算與電腦計算、風管設計、水管路系統設、節能規劃與設計、空調系統設計實例練習。
schedule:
Week 1　　Air-Conditioning Systems
Week 2　　Moist Air Properties and Conditioning Processes
Week 3　　Moist Air Properties and Conditioning Processes
Week 4　　Moist Air Properties and Conditioning Processes
Week 5　　Comfort and Health—Indoor Environmental Quality
Week 6　　Comfort and Health—Indoor Environmental Quality
Week 7　　Heat Transmission in Building Structures
Week 8　　Solar Radiation
Week 9　　Midterm Exam
Week 10　　The Cooling Load
Week 11　　Flow, Pumps, and Piping Design
Week 12　　Flow, Pumps, and Piping Design
Week 13　　Flow, Pumps, and Piping Design
Week 14　　Fans and Building Air Distribution
Week 15　　Fans and Building Air Distribution
Week 16　　Fans and Building Air Distribution
Week 17　　Energy Saving Technology of HVAC
Week 18　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
專題、作業、課堂表現：40%
期中考：30%
期末考：30%
materials:
教材書名：
1.　　Faye C. McQuiston and Jerald D. Parker, Heating, Ventilating, and Air Conditioning Analysis and Design, John Wiley & Sons, 2004.

參考書籍：
1. ASHRAE Handbook.
2. Handbook of Air Conditioning System Design, Carrier.
3. Mechanical and electrical equipment for buildings, Benjamin Stein and John S. Reynolds, 2005, Wiley
3.　　綠建築設計技術彙編，內政部建築研究所
